001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters;
002
003/**
004 * Represents a deferred or lazy evaluation of an object.
005 *
006 * <p>Implementations of this interface provide a mechanism for delaying
007 * the creation of an object until it is explicitly needed.
008 * This is particularly useful for scenarios where test data or
009 * dependencies should not be instantiated at the beginning of a test
010 * but rather at a specific point during execution.
011 *
012 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the type of object that will be
013 * lazily instantiated.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
016 */
017@FunctionalInterface
018public interface Late<T> {
019
020   /**
021    * Retrieves or initializes the object when required.
022    *
023    * <p>The actual instantiation logic is deferred until this method is invoked.
024    * The returned object should be fully constructed and ready for use.
025    *
026    * @return The instantiated object of type {@code T}.
027    */
028   T create();
029
030}
